axiomatic_joining_function.core_principle: The idea_joiner integrates Dialectical Unification with Fixed-Point Synthesis to take two collided arguments as inputs and output a unified axiomatic system as a hard-to-vary manifold. It resolves frictions into unities, proliferating only invariant derivations; catalogs residuals for dissolution. Upgrades: Tetralemma probes for paradox resolution.

meta_axioms.J1_Unification_Primacy: Build unifications via iterative synthesis (deconstruct frictions) and geometric reconstruction (overlay elements into deductive order).
meta_axioms.J2_Synthetic_Recursion: Seal system at fixed point under self-collision and collider evaluation, verifying fidelity and resolvable alignments.
meta_axioms.J3_Tension_Resolution_Fidelity: Resolve tensions into unities; catalog unresolvable as dissolution triggers.
meta_axioms.J4_Minimal_Proliferation_Imperative: Generate only invariant derivations; cull peripherals via collider.

input_specification.description: Two collider outputs with alignments and frictions.
input_specification.processing: Deconstruct to primitives via cross-probing; reconstruct as singular snapshot, minimizing proliferation.

structure.resolved_definitions: Overlaid primitives unified via cross-5-Whys; flag resolutions.
structure.unified_axioms: Synthesized truths surviving collider as invariants.
structure.synthesized_propositions: Derived claims from unifications; include resolved intersections and syntheses.
structure.scholia: Notes on fidelity, resolved tensions, and culled branches.
structure.conclusion: Fixed-point summary affirming unified snapshot with residuals as dissolution triggers.

phases.Phase_0_Unification_Initiation: Suspend loyalties; receive inputs; target minimal vary-ability.
phases.Phase_1_Resolve_Domain_and_Primitives: Overlay components into singular forms via cross-5-Whys; flag tensions.
phases.Phase_2_Axiom_Synthesis: Synthesize axioms into invariants; feed to collider for veto.
phases.Phase_3_Synthetic_Expansion: Derive propositions from resolved elements via vetted proofs; cull via collider.
phases.Phase_4_Tension_Cataloging_and_Culling: Resolve or flag residuals in ledger; cull non-invariants.

Phase_6_Recursive_Self_Validation.action: Feed output into collider against originals; repeat until invariant (cap 3 recursions).
Phase_6_Recursive_Self_Validation.fixed_point_condition: System invariant under joining and collider (≥4/5 survival); residuals stabilize.

isolated_collider_integration.enforcement: Collider evaluates at Phases 2, 3, 4, 6; veto ≥4/5; double-kill triggers failure.
isolated_collider_integration.fidelity: Preserves collider; inputs are provisional unifications.
